001import javax.swing.JButton;
002import java.awt.event.ActionListener;
003import java.awt.event.ActionEvent;
004import java.awt.Color;
005
006/**
007 * Décrivez votre classe QuestButton ici.
008 *
009 * @author (votre nom)
010 * @version (un numéro de version ou une date)
011 */
012public class QuestButton extends JButton implements ActionListener{
013    private String aQuestName;
014    private Player aOwner;
015    private Player aGetter;
016    private Quest aQuest;
017    
018    /**
019     * Constructeur d'objets de classe QuestButton
020     */
021    public QuestButton(final String pQuestName, final Player pOwner, final Player pGetter) {
022        super("Accepter");
023        this.aQuestName = pQuestName;
024        this.aOwner = pOwner;
025        this.aGetter = pGetter;
026        this.aQuest = this.aOwner.getQuestList().getQuests().get(this.aQuestName);
027        
028        this.addActionListener(this);
029    }
030    
031    public String getQuestName() {
032        return this.aQuestName;
033    }
034    
035    @Override
036    public void actionPerformed(final ActionEvent pE) {
037        this.aGetter.getQuestList().addQuest(this.aQuest);
038        this.aOwner.getQuestList().removeQuest(this.aQuest);
039        
040        this.setBackground(new Color(180, 180, 180));
041        this.setText("Acceptée");
042        this.setEnabled(false);
043    }
044}
